name: Multiplayer VR Game (LAN) Quest 1+2
description:
Looking to experience an immersive and engaging multiplayer VR game on your Quest 1 and 2 stand alone headset? Our game offers seamless LAN multiplayer with multiple headsets, ensuring an ultra-low latency experience. With a range of modern guns and characters to choose from, you'll be able to create a unique and personalized gaming experience. And thanks to our use of advanced ALS animations, you can expect smooth and realistic movements throughout the game. 

NOTE: May continue development if there is enough interest adding new levels, fixing bugs and such, this is a prototype for me and my Daughter to play together and it is fun! Hope someone else can also get some enjoyment out of it!
